abusefilter-edit-builder-vars-sfs-blocke: Abuse filter syntax option in a dropdown from the group {{msg-mw|abusefilter-edit-builder-group-vars}}.
stopforumspam-blocked:
Message a user sees when their IP address is denylisted and they cannot edit.

Parameters:
* $1 - the user's current IP address
stopforumspam-is-blocked: {{doc-important|1=Do not change/translate the {{SITENAME}} magic word.}} Shown in [[Special:Block]] when the IP address to be blocked already has restrictions issued by the StopForumSpam extension. GDPR stands for the European Union's [[:w:General Data Protection Regulation|General Data Protection Regulation]]. You may use the acronym that is common for your language. See also [[:d:Q1172506|this Wikidata item]] for a list short names used for this legal instrument by different languages. Parameters: * $1 - the IP address.
